TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {134105=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 212795=Neyveli Lignite is in the Power - Generation & Distribution sector. The company management includes B Surender Mohan - Chairman & Managing Director, A K Dubey - Part Time Official Director, Sarat Kumar Acharya - Director, Rakesh Kumar - Director, S Rajagopal - Director, M B N Rao - Director, V Murali - Director, S Boopathy - Director - Projects, C V Sankar - Part Time Official Director, Subir Das - Director.
